ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableCardIc: Enable/disable clickable card images thumbnails in the Sidebar and in Card Stack app windows. Cards will always be displayed either face-down or face-up depending on how the icon shows them.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableWhispe: Enable/disable whispering card details to the DM on view.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards full-screen when the built-in "Draw a Card" macro or api.draw() call is used, or when cards are drawn into a hand with the Draw action.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.whatDetermin: Select the logic that determines which card face is initially shown on display when performing a Draw action, or executing the "Draw a Card" macro or other api.draw() calls. "Source stack determines face" means a drawn card will initially display either face-up or face-down based on how it is facing in its source stack.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDramat: When a Draw action is performed, if the card should be shown face-up, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then flipping them over automatically after a brief pause. Note: parameters passed into the "Draw a Card" macro or an api.draw() call wlil override this setting.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards full-screen when they are dealt using the Deal action.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.whatDetermin: Select the logic that determines which card face is initially shown on display when performing a Deal action, or executing the macro or other api.draw() calls. "Source stack determines face" means a dealt card will initially display either face-up or face-down based on how it is facing in its source stack.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDramat: When a Deal action is performed, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards full-screen when they are passed using the Pass action.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.whatDetermin: Select the logic that determines which card face is initially shown on display when performing a Pass action, or executing the macro or other api.draw() calls. "Source stack determines face" means a passed card will initially display either face-up or face-down based on how it is facing in its source stack.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDramat: When a Pass action is performed, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardB: Configure the default border width on displayed cards.
Configure the default border color on displayed cards.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardG: Configure the default card shadow/glow color.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardB: Configure the default card back image on images viewed as cards.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.dramaticReve: Configure the number of ms to delay before automiatcally flipping a card to face-up, when a "Dramtic Reveal" setting is enabled for a particular action. Default is 500 (half a second).
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.playersCanSh: Enable the Share To All Feature for Players
The Share To All feature (e.g. the eyeball in the top-right of the card display screen, and a few macro/api functions) is only enabled for the GM by default.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.imagePat: Image URL or file path not provided.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.deckNotF: No deck by that name was found.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.cardIdNo: Please provide a card name or ID.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.cardNotF: No card by that ID or name was found.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.pileNotF: No pile found by the name "{pileName}". Creating a new discard pile by that name.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.ui.ignoreWordsInDeckN: the, thy, a, an, in, on, of, for, de, le, la, el, los, las, deck, cards, card
